document_data.caption: A map showing Melanith Bay in eastern Dambrath.
document_data.name: Melanith Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Melanith Bay''' was found in eastern [[Dambrath]]. The bay was named for Queen [[Melanith]] who ruled Dambrath during the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Melantih Bay stretched north from the [[Great Sea]] and was tucked safely away from the brunt of any violent sea storms. The [[River Ammath]] flowed into the bay from its north side near [[Hazuth]].
